attributes.action: Veto the proposed EU Holocause denial law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Germany wants to make holocaust denial a crime across the EU. This would be a massive and unacceptable curtailment of the freedom of speech in this country. We should not accept such ridiculous laws from the EU, and the UK should seek to veto the law as soon as it is proposed. Such bans may be acceptable in Germany, but they shouldn't be here.
